definition: to favor the rich and disdain the poor (idiom)/snobbish
to dislike/suspicion/resentment/enmity/abbr. for 嫌犯[xian2 fan4], criminal suspect
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: One shouldn't be too snobbish, as snobs are hated by all people.
sentences.chinese: 做人不能太勢利眼了，嫌貧愛富的人讓人痛恨。
